alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Cross (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 4:56PM CDT until March 31 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...TORNADO EMERGENCY FOR Parkin and Earle, AR... The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northern Crittenden County in eastern Arkansas... Southeastern Cross County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 455 PM CDT, a confirmed large and destructive tornado was observed near Parkin, moving east at 50 mph. TORNADO EMERGENCY for Parkin and Earle, Arkansas. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. TAKE COVER NOW! HAZARD...Deadly tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be destroyed. Considerable damage to homes, businesses, and vehicles is likely and complete destruction is possible. * Locations impacted include... Earle, Parkin, Gilmore, Jericho, Turrell, Clarkedale, Smithdale, Three Forks, Booker, Colton, Twist, McDonald, Cloar, Coldwater, Togo, River Front, Lansing, Wittsburg, Duvall and Lambethville. TORNADO...OBSERVED TORNADO DAMAGE THREAT...CATASTROPHIC MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a large, extremely dangerous and potentially deadly tornado is on the ground. To protect your life, TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If in a mobile home, a vehicle or outdoors, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
